attributes.action: Keep driving test and lessons going ahead
attributes.additional_details: When driving tests and lessons resumed after the first lockdown, a surge amount of these services have been reported. These services are vital for the daily activities for many people, and they also encouraged the use of private vehicles to reduce the risk of transmission in public transport. helped The Transport Secretary has also commented earlier that  'It's vital for people to move safely'.
attributes.background: Review the suspension on driving tests and lessons in England due to the impact of second lockdown from 4 November

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557462
